Half life 2. Kontynuacja przygód Gordona Freemana,sama gra i jej historia na pierwsze zetknięcie się z nią jest dobra jednak za 30 razem przechodząc hl2 czułem się monotonnie. Ogółem gra jest dobra polecam osobom które zaczynają swoją przygodę z Uniwersum Half life.

Oq falar desse jogo?

Half-life это бесконечно бесящие смерти. Это бесконечно бесящие комбайны(альянс). А также хороший симулятор вождения машины без рук. 10 ВОРТИГОНТОВ ИЗ 10! И даже не думай о 3-ей части!
HA-HA , CLASSIC.

Ce jeux n'étant pas tout jeune , renvoie pourtant une immersion total ! De l'histoire a l'ambiance , passant pas le son 7.1 .
Offrant un gameplay trés bien travaillé , on ne peut décrocher ça sourie et son clavier pendant plusieurs heures.


Il faut aussi savoir ce creuser la tête car la suite n'est pas toujours a porté de main , ne pas hésiter a casser les caisses en bois , revenir sur ces pats , et faire le tour de la map plusieurs fois . 

Je recommande a 1000% !

standing by for HL3

Es dificil expresar lo que se siente cuando se juega por primera vez a este juego. Secuela de un buen juego, que, innovaba y era divertido, tampoco era capaz de llegarte de verdad. (Más aún durante estos años).
Lo contrario de este, obra magna del gordo con lentes de harry potter. Pasarán los años, decadas y cualquier manifestación numerica de esta fuerza a la que llamamos tiempo...y volveremos a sonreir cuando Barney nos lanze la palanca, cuando vemos a Alyx por primera vez...al ver los cosmicos ojos de Gman.

Ah, half life a classic, Great story telling, Great idea.


10/10

Before playing:
I don't get why everyone is obsessed with this game and the memes.

After playing:
Where Half-Life 3?
-Monke, probably

Seriously this game is a landmark of FPS games, featuring an excellent sci-fi story and not just about war.

Coupled with diverse and fast-paced gameplay it pushed the limits of single player games.

A true masterpiece!

Classic materpiece sequel to a classic masterpiece game. Everything aged like fine wine from the graphics, gameplay to story, just get it and complete it once because it still feels really great to play. In the end a 10/10

9/10

Me encanta este juego. Si no lo has jugado, ya tardaste mucho, juego totalmente recomendado, muy bueno incluso y no ha envejecido nada, con una graficas increibles hoy en dia, y una mecanicas de juego innovadores y divertidas. Y pues que mas decir de nuevo que no hallas escuchado, pues totalmente reconmendable.

I originally wrote a review about 2 years ago where I talked about how I didn't like it as much as I figured. After playing Black Mesa, I decided to give this another go and the second time playing was phenomenal. I played the Update version and then decided to come back to this. 

This game has aged like a fine wine. The graphics, while dated, still look awesome and there's a large modding community dedicated to bringing the graphics into the new generation (e.g. Update, MMOD & CM2013) but regardless of that, the gameplay holds up incredibly well, and that is what's important. 

All in all, I really enjoyed the game and if you like first-person-shooters and basic problem solving, this game is definitely for you.

One of the best games.

Wish I could like the game , but it's not for my taste sadly.

I get it , the game never takes control over your characters even in "cutscences".

The weapons are basic, and the story is interesting enough.

But I , as a hoardcore guy who favors gameplay over story , can't really enjoy this as much I would enjoy DOOM for example.

Why do I still recommand this ? because I have no desire to get an angry fanboy telling me I don't know anything about gaming.

Not to mention I'm not saying the game is bad , its just not my taste.

Игра просто супер дeрьмo. 1. Не играбельная хyeта , не понятно куда идти. 2. Физика отвратительная , единственное оружие где присутствует отдача только у револьвера. 3. Очень не понятный сюжет , что там происходит , да xyй пойми . Произошла авария на Black Mesa , фримен решил бегать за g-man'ом . Просто 10/10 сюжет. 4. ОЧЕНЬ ОЧЕНЬ ОЧЕНЬ TУПЫЕ НПС , я раз 10 застрял в них когда шел. Единственный плюс игры - это революционная графика на то время . Ужасная игра , дeрьмo редкосное.
